body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Follow the API semantics here: https://github.com/temporalio/api/commit/4130a80613796f56a2c6be9fc22da9023929c645

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Could also only expose this in the CLI. Not really that important to expose in SDK IMO
title: Versioning GA: Make Pinned Version Optional when setting Pinned Override on already-pinned workflow
